title: Aathangara Oraththil Lyrics Yaan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aathangara Oraththil
Singer(s): Gana Bala
Movie: Yaan
Music: Harrish Jeyaraj
Lyrics: Kabilan

Aathangara Oraththil ninnaale
kuyilu kuppan kuruviya pola.
Akkam pakkam yarukkum theriyaama
look-u vitta bucknu mela.

Kaththadikkum dheisayi en manasa
kalutha katti ilukkudhu sela.
Aappthakku paayaa kari pola
aaraayi mulunguraa aala.

Thookkathil srikkuren thannaala
yekkathil thavikkuren ponnaale. (2)
Oru karappaan poochi pola
enna kavuthu pottaale.

Mosamaa kadikkura kannaale
pesave mudiyala ennaale
adi innoru thadava idhayam silirkka
iduppa aattaadha.

Aathangara Oraththil ninnaale
kuyilu kuppan kuruviya pola.
Akkam pakkam yarukkum theriyaama
look-u vitta bucknu mela.

go we gotta shake it
penne maama kitta modhu
nee nadakkura nadai udai ayyo
en manasula yedho thadai.

Naan enna theruvula suthura naayaa
iravum pagalum enna kalladichi
thorathura.
Ongappan kitta adivaanga vaikkura
nallava pola nadichu yemaathura.

Unna pathuruven pathuruven naanum
vandhutten vandhutten penne
oru murai kadhala sollu.

Unna pidichruven pidichiruven naanum
vadhirukken vandhirukken penne
kadhala sollu.

Vaai pesum vaasana kiliye
ne pesum oviya silayeo
andha vennilakulla vadacurry
sutta aaya neethaano.

Nee pona aaradi enakku
nethaane chinchinaa jinukku
adi anjara manikke ginger-u soda
tharava naan unakku.

Naan paartha oruthala neethaney
unnaala tharuthala naanthaaney.
ada neruppula vilundha ration arisi
puluvena aaneney.

Mangaatha raniya paarthaeney
kaimaathaa kadhal ketteney
indha komala valli enna thotta
kulikkave maatteney.

Aathangara Oraththil ninnaale
kuyilu kuppan kuruviya pola.
Akkam pakkam yarukkum theriyaama
look-u vitta bucknu mela.

Kaalaaley aadudhu kolusu
yelelo paduthu manasu
oru irumba paartha gaandhagam
pola ilukkudhu ava vayasu.

Raasathi ennudan variya
yemaathi povadhu sariyaa
enna sowrkkapetta beeda pola
mellura arakoraya.

Annaavi maganena irundheney
unnaala theruvula porandeney
en vaadaga cycilil oru mura
vandha vaanaththil parappeney.

Kannaale kannathil adikkaadhey
kannadi valayalaa sinungaadhey
unna nambiye vandha enna ippa
nambiyaar aakkaadhey.

Aathangara ..
kammangara. ..
Aathangara Oraththil ninnaale
kuyilu kuppan jinjinukku jinukku
Akkam pakkam yarukkum theriyaama
look-u vitta dandanakka danukku.

Kaththadikkum dheisayila en manasa
kalutha katti ilukkudhu sela.
Aappthakku paayaa kari pola
aaraayi mulunguraa aala.
